<h3 id="X11520">X(11520)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EXCENTERS-INCENTER REFLECTIONS AND CONWAY</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3-3*(b+c)*a^2-(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a+(b+c)*(3*b^2-4*b*c+3*c^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11520) = 3*(2*R+r)*X(1)-(3*R+2*r)*X(21)</b>
<p>X(11520) lies on these lines:{1,21}, {2,3984}, {7,145}, {8,4208}, {20,3241}, {57,4188}, {65,224}, {72,3305}, {78,474}, {84,1392}, {100,3339}, {226,6871}, {377,519}, {405,3951}, {517,10884}, {527,6872}, {553,4190}, {908,938}, {950,5905}, {960,4666}, {999,1259}, {1001,3962}, {1159,10914}, {1210,6931}, {1331,1451}, {1449,5279}, {1697,3957}, {1706,3935}, {2093,3871}, {2094,3522}, {2098,10391}, {2475,4654}, {3057,7675}, {3218,3601}, {3219,5436}, {3244,4292}, {3295,4018}, {3333,4511}, {3419,6147}, {3434,3671}, {3436,6738}, {3487,6734}, {3622,5273}, {3623,4313}, {3635,4304}, {3679,4197}, {3681,4866}, {3751,3924}, {3811,5902}, {3928,4189}, {3940,5439}, {4084,5119}, {4301,10431}, {4430,6762}, {4848,10528}, {5045,5730}, {5086,5290}, {5175,5665}, {5223,5260}, {5253,10980}, {5440,5708}, {5542,6737}, {5704,10222}, {5709,6876}, {5732,11531}, {5837,10587}, {5881,6839}, {6264,9964}, {6837,11240}, {6884,9624}, {7411,7991}, {7971,9799}, {10444,11521}, {10861,11519}, {10883,11522}, {10885,11532}, {11220,11224}</p>
<p>
X(11520) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3951,405), (5250,1)<br>
X(11520) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,3868,63), (2,11523,3984), (8,11036,5249), (78,942,3306), (3243,3340,145), (3623,9965,4313), (11518,11523,2)<br></p>
